statements: SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason = 'Defective';
SELECT id, product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE customer_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, product_name FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason='Damaged'
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) as total_returns FROM returned_products GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_returns > 1
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason LIKE '%not satisfied%'
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date ASC, id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, max_return_days FROM return_policy WHERE refund_type = 'Full Refund' ORDER BY max_return_days ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_name, return_reason, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' AND return_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT policy_name, max_return_days FROM return_policy WHERE max_return_days > 7 ORDER BY max_return_days DESC
SELECT * FROM returned_products JOIN return_policy ON returned_products.product_id = return_policy.policy_id WHERE return_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason = 'damaged' ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE product_id = 2 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason, return_date FROM returns;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_details ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, sum(quantity_returned) AS total_returned FROM returned_products GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE price > 100
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sum(quantity_returned) as total_returned FROM returned_products GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_returned > 10
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='123456789';
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT return_date, return_reason FROM return_history WHERE product_id=101;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100.00;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT rp.product_id, rp.return_reason, rh.return_date FROM returned_products rp JOIN return_history rh ON rp.product_id = rh.product_id;
